title: Chain Forks Generated
description: Analysis of VeChain Thor blockchain forks and side chains - Generated by thorflux dashgen

options.content: Chain Forks

targets.query:
from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "forks" and r["_field"] == "index" and r["_value"] == 1)
  |> group(columns: ["signer"])
  |> count()
  |> group()
  |> sort(desc: true)
  |> keep(columns: ["signer", "_value"])

panels.title: Side Chains (Creators)
panels.description: Table showing side chain creators and their activity

targets.query:
from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "forks")
  |> pivot(
      rowKey:["_time"],
      columnKey: ["_field"],
      valueColumn: "_value"
  )
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "group", "signer", "number", "parent_id", "id", "score", "length", "index"])
  |> drop(columns: ["group", "_time", "index"])
  |> group()
  |> sort(columns: ["number"], desc: true)

panels.title: Side Chain Blocks
panels.description: Detailed table of side chain blocks and their properties

targets.query:
from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "block_stats" and r["_field"] == "total_score")
  |> drop(columns: ["signer"])

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "forks")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "score")
  |> group(columns: ["group"])
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "group", "_value"])

panels.title: Side Chains (Total Score)
panels.description: Time series showing total score comparison between main chain and side chains

targets.query:
from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "forks")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "index")
  |> group(columns: ["group"])
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "group", "_value"])

panels.title: Side Chains (Depth)
panels.description: Time series showing the depth/index of side chains over time
